entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 08:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
